data.name: Debit And Credit:A Walk Through Accounting Hell
data.detailed_description:
A college student's attempt at making an educational game, in other words an interactive problem set for Accounting Principle students.

Bad accountants go to accounting hell.

Complete an accountant's walk through accounting hell, solving puzzles and searching for save points shaped like T-accounts.
This is an educational game, with the purpose of providing an immersive and interactive problem set for the first half of Accounting Principles, or Accounting 101.
Find the answer and step onto the corresponding tiles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core i5-4300U 1.90HZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (R) Core i5-4300U 1.90HZ
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tentative.
